Ah.. it's not part of the plugin config but if you add this to the Universal Replacer.cfg

EVAjetpack = Textures/Kerbals/EVAJetpack

And name your texture EVAJetpack it will replace the eva Jetpack ;P (Just be sure to really call it EVAJetpack) with a big J
Would it be possible to change particle textures or no?
Edited August 13, 2013 by Cooly568
Best Looking Kirrim Ever... but for one thing... NO SPLOSIONS IN THE BACKGROUND

The normal map for the suit doesnt work.

just add "EVAtextureNRM = Textures/Kerbals/EVASuitNRM" beneath "EVAtexture = Textures/Kerbals/EVASuit" in the Replacer.cfg

And name the file "EVASuitNRM"
ss kirrin with tac self destruct so you can capture moment of explosive pls

Would it be possible to change particle textures or no?

Which ones in particular?
Can someone please make me a a suit like the original just black and white with this logo on it?

Update to v3.1

v3.1 - Small update due to a lot of people retexturing Kerbals. Added support for the Kerbal EVA Jet-pack and the missing EVA normal map

After seeing so many people mess with the suits, I thought I might officially add support for what many are having to temporary add them selves.

Also, I know I mentioned adding a variety feature for the EVA Suits would be cool, but considering they consist of a suit and helm texture separately, you would have helmets and suits mixed up randomly. Faces for example are only one texture and don't require matching up. I will add a EVA Suit and Helmet variety feature in the next update, you just have to keep the randomizing in mind when designing suits.

I'm currently working on my own texture pack which you can find here. Once I'm done with that I will add support for more textures to Universe Replacer, I think everyone is somewhat happy with what they can do so far, so I think I can take my time and do the texture pack for a while.

Edited August 13, 2013 by Tingle
Congratulations on 1000 posts. Thank you Tingle and all the contributors in this thread for all the work you have put forth.
